lead_paragraph: RIZZUTO--Patricia Anne, 71, of New York, NY passed away on January 1, 2016 in Portland, ME. Patricia was born in Newark, NJ on March 8, 1944 the daughter of Hall of Fame Yankees shortstop Phil Rizzuto and Cora Ann Esselborn Rizzuto. She was an incredibly loving and dedicated mother and grandmother. She enjoyed spending time at her house on Fire Island and playing with her granddaughter Lucia Rizzuto-Michelsen. She is survived by her daughter Jennifer Rizzuto and her daughter-in-law Heidi Michelsen Golden; sister Penny Yetto; brother Philip Rizzuto Jr; and her beloved granddaughter Lucia Rizzuto- Michelsen. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  RIZZUTO, PATRICIA ANNE
